ratings.rComments: Definitely not as easy at ATMS 120, but still a really good class. If you put in the work, you can literally guarantee an A+. You are allowed to post solutions to the daily homework on the class discussion board, and the tests are very fair. Snodgrass is one of those rare professors who doesn't take pride in failing students.

He is a great professor! He knows this is a GenEd course and because of that gives a lot of help to students. Lectures are interesting and he uses tons of funny videos and pictures. All of the tests were online and there was tons of extra credit. If you have questions he is always willing to help. Definitely would recommend this class to everyone!

GREAT professor.  This man is highly passionate and has numerous anecdotes about the material.  He makes the class go by so quickly.  Easiest GenEd you will ever take.  All exams were online even though the class met in person.  ERIC SNODGRASS IS A WONDERFUL PROFESSOR AND HUMAN BEING.  I would take this class multiple times if I had the time.

This class was one of my favorites at UIUC. I decided to take it after a tree almost fell on my car during a microburst. This class will teach you weather safety and is very interesting and engaging to boot. Prof Snodgrass is clearly passionate about the subject matter and tells memorable and often hilarious anecdotes. Class was always packed!
ERIC SNODGRASS IS THE CUTEST THING ON EARTH. YOU WILL NOT REGRET TAKING THIS COURSE

He's very thoughtful and an amazing professor. Snodgrass so far been one of the best teachers I've had at this school and I actually learned a lot. It's hard to get a seat in this class so grab it if you get a chance! I-clicker questions, but it's okie if you get it wrong, it's just for attendance points! Tests are easy if you pay attention!
The most enthusiastic professor I have ever had. Tells memorable stories. Teaches interesting topics. And engages the class well. Great guy, great class, highly recommend.

This is one of the best classes I have taken at UIUC. The course material is pretty interesting. There are 3 exams, but all the stuff you need to know are on the lectures. The class is very straightforward. I really appreciate that because there are classes where the exams are super tough. Overall, I would take this class again and would recommend!

The perfect gen ed class for non-STEM majors (fulfills both sciences and QR1). Class is mandatory due to iClickers. Tests are all online and the final is optional. You should buy the textbook if  you want to do the work.  For people with an actual interest in the material, Snodgrass is very passionate about his field.
Love this guy!!!
Well why don't we have more teachers like this on campus? He so dreamy and persuasive he was meant for teaching, the day he leaves will be a sad one. Really fun class, GPA Booster.
He is such a nice teacher! If you go to class and finish all the weekly problems, you should get an A. There are 3 exams but pretty easy, he even made the final exam optional!
Very passionate professor. Lectures are interesting. Highly recommended.
Eric is overall great! ATMS 120 is easy a'f and is fun to go to.
Regardless of your major, try to take ATMS 120 before you graduate. It's a class you will always remember.
Awesome guy, great class, useful information
Great teacher, great class!
Amazing professor. Really useful information that is helpful in real life. Take this class!!!!!!

Easy class with good information. Try and take it with people you know. It'll be a lot easier that way! Weekly challenge problems (math because it covers a Quant II) and exams he encourages you to take with others. Book is optional but DONT GET IT. I used it once and realized I didn't have to for the rest of the class. Attendance 25% of grade.
This is my absolute favorite class I have taken at UIUC and he is my favorite teacher I have had at UIUC.

Amazing teacher! Such a smart man, who can easily explain science to people who aren't science orientated at all. I learned so much in this class and am really thankful that I took it. I wish I could take more classes with him!

Great Professor! Took his online class  and his lectures are actually enjoyable, easy to understand, and informative. He is quick to respond to questions and helps you understand challenge problem assignments so you actually learn the material. Text books were only NEEDED for extra credit reading quizzes. I would recommend him to anybody!

Best teacher I have ever had! He was interesting, funny and knew what he was talking about. I liked coming to class. He shows a lot of videos but they are all super interesting and relevant. Tests are super easy and he encourages you to work with others.
Amazing. He just really wants us all to pass. And I actually did learn a lot! I missed some assignments so my grade suffered but really, if you do the work you'll get an A.

Super friendly. Lectures were lively and interesting, with anecdotes interspersed between lecture content. He really enjoys teaching and loves atmospheric sciences. All assignments/exams/notes are online and he encourages you to collaborate. Textbook rarely used, so don't buy. Bring your laptop to class to fill in his PowerPoint notes.

The most amazing professor I have had for my undergrad career! Seriously, if you don't love this class by the end then you must not have gone to his lectures. Severe and hazardous weather with some occasional life advice thrown in! Take this class, do it, right now!
Awesome professor.
Snodgrass is lit-rally the best professor I have had at U of I. I would recommend him to anyone for any class he teaches. This class was fun, very informative, and he makes you want to go to lecture.
Amazing professor. If you can, take his class.

He is by far the best professor on the face of the Earth! He is also so enthusiastic and willing to help. He has an amazing way of teaching, which makes even hard topics seem easy. There are 2 non cumulative midterms and 1 final. He doesn't try to trick you at all. Class was easy and very fair, plus you actually find yourself learning quite a bit.

He is an excellent instructor. If you think it is impossible for someone to be this nice, think again. He has a true passion for severe weather. As for the course work if you don't do so well on one assignment, you have plenty of opportunities to make it up with mini extra credit assignments given twice every week. It is a very fun class.

I've never had a prof that was more excited about teaching and the material than he was. I love going to class, and even though I'm a very spacey person, he'd never lose my attention. Take this course if you can.

Awesome class! You will learn a lot. Plenty of extra credit and easy! Also easy to contact him if you're having trouble with the material! He really cares for his students and loves his job, which makes his class enjoyable! It's not an easy A because you actually have to work for it. But it's not impossible! Final grade A

Great guy.  If your unsure about what you want to do in life, and your interested in math and physics, take this course.  Or if you just want an easy A while actually learning material and not wasting money on a pointless course just for an A, take this course.  It is interesting, applicable, and fun at times.
Snodgrass is a great lecturer and awesome guy. Super helpful material. Not hard to get an A if you do the work.
Awesome teacher! He's funny and his lectures are interesting. Easy A! Highly recommend!

Professor Snodgrass is very helpful. He was always available. Since this was a summer class it went kind of fast but there were 3 tests and 20, 10 questions quizzes. The material isn't easy or hard. But at the end he raised everyone's grade by 2%. I'd recommend him to everyone he's very nice.
Super easy class and really helpful and amazing teacher! Was actually very interesting class also and  learned a lot.
HE IS AMAZING! HE IS VERY PASSIONATE ABOUT HIS JOB AND HE HAS FUN RELAYING THE INFORMATION TO YOU.
He is definitely the best professor. He is very very knowledged, and love to tell interesting stories. Will never regret taking his class

Easy professor. Although there were a lot of work, such as weekly challenge problem, Active learning exercise every class, and online homework, however, the exam is online also, so you can always do it with open notes. Also there was like 5% extra credit points, which was helpful. Professor said majority of the student in this class got an A.
I highly recommend this course! The instructor is outstanding and even if you don't have an interest in the content, he makes it interesting.
He's the bomb!! Never thought I could be so interested in the weather.
FANTASTIC!! This class was amazing and Professor Snodgrass is great! He gives a lot of extra credit and makes it very easy to do well and understand. I recommend this class for everyone!

I've had Eric for ATMS 120 and 201 now. He is also my advisor. I can say this man is truly passionate about the material. He is great at explaining everything and makes sure you understand it. The classes are extremely easy, just do the work and review the material. He is also great to talk to as well and have a conversation with. Take his classes!
Do I need to repeat what everyone else has said? Snodgrass is awesome, and I've actually learned a lot. Answer a question correctly in class and get an ATMS keychain. I WILL CHERISH MINE FOREVER

I wasn't at the right math level to be taking this class so I struggled a bit; also didn't study much which is a horrible habit I'm working on. Goes into more depth than ATMS 120 and is still interesting! Makes me love my major. Eric is the most helpful and encouraging professor I've ever had! Do not be afraid to ask for help!! You won't regret it.

He knows what he's talking about, and it's easy to tell he loves his field. He excites students through his excitement about his passion - I think all teachers should teach this way. Also, class was very funny and easy - definitely take this, no matter what major. Extremely helpful and interesting weather information.
Cares about his students. Extremely funny. During office hours, guides you until you solve weekly challenges (same with TAs). A Quant II you should definitely take.

Eric Snodgrass is hands down one of the greatest teachers I have ever had. Did my James Scholar project with him and he was completely willing to meet me for office hours whenever I was free. Take this class! It's easy, fun, and Eric Snodgrass is great!
Fantastic teacher. Very helpful if you ask. Teaches clearly and very understanding of students.
Everything has already been said here. He is fantastic, his class is as easy as it gets, he is funny, and he is a good person. Highly recommended.

Snodgrass is the best professor ever!! He is so down to earth and his classes are very exciting! I went to class each day for fun, yes you heard me for fun! He excites his students with the knowledge he provides. Every student should take his class at UofI to experience what a real, passionate and caring professor is like! Snodgrass you the man!

The best class on campus. Eric does a phenomenal job explaining the material. His lectures are a blast, as he has many great pictures, videos, and stories. A class every U of I student should take hands down.

favorite professor at u of i, hands down. he really loves what he's teaching and makes it super interesting. also, the class counts towards the quant II and physical science gen ed requirements. attendance is mandatory for the daily practice problems that you turn in, but honestly you'll just want to go because he's such a great teacher.

Amazing. Dont graduate without taking ATMS 120 or 210. The material would be pretty hard with any other teacher, but Eric makes it simple and even fun. I never thought I would look forward to an 80 minute class, but this guy is a pretty bomb teacher.
THE BEST. Period.
Awesome!

This guy is seriously one of the greatest people on the planet. He puts so much effort into this class and will take the time to help you with a concept until you get it. This was by far my most favorite class I've ever taken, EVER. The man is hilarious and class is rarely boring. He makes me wish I could be friends with him outside of class...

He's like the cooler older brother I never had.  We were studying Hurricanes, so he played Cyclone by Baby Bash in class.  The material is actually pretty interesting too, since it can be applied to every day life.  It's pretty easy to get an A+.  If you are lucky enough to snag a seat in his class, enjoy it!  Snodgrass runs U of I, end of story.
Awesome guy and really good at teaching the material. I wish he taught all of my classes.

Eric Snograss is the best professor I have ever had. He actually cares about his students succeeding rather than some percentage of how many can get A's, B's, etc. I was excited to go to this class. The only class I have been excited to attend. And I'm an accounting major.

Eric Snodgrass is such a great teacher-- he always shows youtube videos and makes learning about Severe Weather fun! He is so funny, and not too sore on the eyes either. Seriously, hottest teacher on campus. Great class, would definitely recommend!

If you do the extra credit and study (at least a little) for the exams, an A+ should be within easy reach. If you?re looking for a ?fun? GPA booster, this is it. Also, Snodgrass is a dedicated teacher and he makes coming to class worthwhile by making things interesting and entertaining.

Best professor you will ever have. Funny, adorable, and ridiculously intelligent. I loved this class so much and wish I could take it again. It's easy to get honors credit also, and I would recommend this to EVERYBODY. Take it!!
Snoddy is the best prof you will ever have at this university or any other. The class is interesting, the man is interesting...I could  go on and on. The final was online...nuff said.
Best class ever

He is an awesome instructor. He's funny, cool, witty, etc. And his class is THE most practical class I've ever taken. You learn a lot of interesting and practical information. I highly recommend taking this class even if it's not for a gen ed requirement.

He's really excited about teaching, and doesn't play tricks. Everything is pretty straight forward and if you go/read then it's easy. I assume it wouldn't be bad if you rarely went, but it's a great class with quite a bit of practicality. It makes you so much more aware and it's fun. He gives you notes and all you do is fill in a few blanks.
Ummm, 107% in the class? I think so. Easiest class ever.

Professor Snodgrass is excellent. The class is very linear; go to class, do in-class assignment (professor gives you the answers), do online extra-credit, take exam. Rinse and repeat for a relatively easy "A".

I <3 E Snoddy. I hear the top regrets from Illinois students after they graduate is 1) not studying abroad, then followed by a close second, not taking ATMS 120. TAKE THIS CLASS BEFORE YOU GRADUATE! Class is super interesting and fun, and Snodgrass is hysterical. My only regret is not winning an "I love meteorology" keychain.

BEST CLASS EVER!! Attendance isn't mandatory but you do workbooks pages randomly which gives you major points. Take this class even if you don't need it as a gen ed! Also I strongly urge James Scholars to take it the project is awesome and easy

I took 120 and 201 with him. He is simply the best professor ever. He never tests you on anything he didn't teach. He is so enthusiastic everyday and is extremely helpful even though he's busy all the time. His main concern is teaching you, but by the end of the semester, he just wants to give you all A's. What an amazing person. Clearest professor

Snodgrass wants his class to be an easy A. It's actually interesting and it fulfills the Physical Science Gen Ed.  Definitely take it if you can get in.  Also, you need the workbook, but rarely need the textbook for assignments.
This one of the best classes and one of the best professors ever! This class is fun,easy, and interesting. Eric is a great guy. TAKE THIS CLASS!! You will not regret it at all.

The. Best. Never thought I would look forward to going to class but Snodgrass makes it happen. If you don't get in A in this class you are seriously an idiot and should consider dropping out of school. He makes all the topics exciting and interesting and should consider teaching other subjects because I wish I could have him teach all my classes.
He's the best. Take ATMS 120. Easy A, interesting topics, satisfies GenEd Physical Science.
Easily one of the best teachers i have had on campus.
AWESOME PROFESSOR!!!  Very Interesting and has a great teaching style.  One of the best professors at U of I!

BEST BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! His class is interesting! He put a lot of effort on preparing his course and make it attractive. He is EXTREMELY HELPFUL and KIND. He is always willing to help!! LIKE HIM!!!

seriously best professor of my life! his stories are always funny and interesting. You will learn so much, and actually retain it because he teaches in such an entertaining way. I always looked forward to his class. He really knows how to motivate and keep a college students attention.

I am an atmospheric sciences major, and took atms 120 and 201 with him. Not only is he an amazing teacher, but he is a great guy, and super helpful to his students. It seems like he's always busy, but he will make the time to help you out with anything. He's definitely one of the best teachers I have ever had.
BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!!!!!!!!! class with interesting topics. you actually learn a lot of information. TAKE THIS CLASS DEFINITELY
BY FAR the BEST teacher I've EVERRRRRR had. I would do anything to take another class with him. I'll miss  esoddy16 =(

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!! get a buddy and do all the online hw's and quizzes together. also, DO NOT BUY THE TEXTBOOK! its a waste of $$ just get the workbook copies from a friend. do all the extra credits :) easy A no question.

Gotta love this guy. Somebody give him a raise please. As the James Bond of meteorology, Eric teaches with tons of YouTube videos and loves storm pictures and the Office. The power points were great, especial the snow storms section. Brings in candy sometimes. Super nice, loves cars too. I will never storm chase with a sun roof. That's a promise.

Great professor. Very easy class. He is a lot of fun, and really enjoys both teaching and weather. He loves to bring up funny stories in class, and still manages to teach something. My advice, take any class of his and don't look back, you'll enjoy it!
Snodgrass is a great professor, he loves his work, the topics he teaches are so interesting, he reiterates what he says with fun//interesting videos & slides.. plus he's so hot & has mad swag.

Snoddy is the BEST!  He cares so much about the material and he really wants his students to do well.  You will actually look forward to coming to class with him!  He is one of the most enthusiastic teachers I've ever seen and he is so nice.

I took this class trying to fill up hours and boost my GPA, which it did, but I also learned a whole lot too.  Just go to class and take notes and you'll do fine on the homework and exams and get an easy A. I actually looked forward to going to class and can genuinely say that I learned something new every time I went. Snodgrass is the greatest.

He is what all professors should be. Really down to earth and funny. Very passionate about the material. If you go to the lectures (which you wont mind going to) and look over the material before a test you will get an A. Gives around 10% of extra credit. I would take any class he teaches
He is a nice guy and teaches the material well.  He is just kinda annoying to listen to .  Maybe its just the way he talks.

Great teacher! His atmos 201 class is a step above atms 100 or atms 120, however its still very straight forward and relatively easy. He's very enthusiastic about teaching and probably one of the greatest teachers on campus. I would highly recommend any class taught by him

Snodgrass is great. He is so nice and good to look at ;) He makes the boring stuff okay and the fun stuff even better. Shows interesting clips and offer tons of extra credit! Tests are fine if you do the homework and review lecture. TAKE THIS CLASS!
He is THE coolest teacher I have ever had. I had no interest in weather prior to this class, but now I love it! Best class of the semester.

I LOVE this class, he's so cool, down to earth, funny, and young. He's always talking about the Office, showing videos, making jokes, I never miss this class and if you study and go to lectures, you should be good. I got an A on both exams so far. TAKE THIS CLASS!!! I always tell everyone! He's what a college professor should be!!! Great elective!!

This is my favorite class to go to because he is so passionate in teacher.  Not only that, but he is good at it.  He is very animated and easy to follow, if you don't understand something, he will explain it to you till you get it.  You watch plenty of videos to keep you entertained in class and you actually learn something, HE IS THE BEST!

snodgrass is hands down the best professor iv had at this university. he is very passionate about his field and he enjoys teaching. he responds to emails and compass freaky fast. atms 120 my fav class this semester. he has made me very interested with his energetic and fun teaching style. great job eric. take this class for nat. science requirement
I'm an English major and I LOVED this class. Snodgrass is hilarious, energetic, and is able to motivate the class to engage in the material. Without a doubt one of the best teachers on this campus.

Very attractive and sweet. His expectations and requirements are made clear from the beginning. He played clips of the Office and lots of videos. I did the crossword during every lecture and came out with B. ATMS 100 with his isn't bad either.

Eric is probably the greatest thing that has happened to General Education and Atmospheric Sciences at the University of Illinois.  His dedication to teaching about the weather makes any student, interested or not, understand the material very easily.  A definite professor to have before graduating at the UIUC...

Snodgrass is as good of a professor you will ever have. Take his class! I have never seen a professor go to such lengths to help his students and he finds ways to always make the class interesting. Go to class, do the assignments, and study for the exams and you should get an A pretty easily.

Eric is a fantastic teacher! He really loves teaching and has great videos. When class gets boring, he knows it and will show videos to perk the class up. If you do your homework and read the discussion on compass about it you can get 100% on all of the homework. He is great about answering homework questions online
best teacher ever. i love eric snodgrass more than life.

Whether it is the great stories of his atmospheric career or the way he gives men pointers on keeping commitments to their wives, Snodgross is the man! I laugh everyday at this ma's humor and enjoy every class. He explains topics extremely well and loves weather. His exams are to the point and do not try to trick you.

Snodgrass is a high-energy professor who really enjoys teaching, which makes his class easier to sit through. Go to lecture to get attendance points (or just have your friend bring your iclicker), do the online HW's on time and study just a few hours for the tests (which are curved) you should get an A.  The hw's were actually harder than the tests
if only all professors were like Eric Snodgrass.....
He makes classes very interesting. Not bad to look at, for a professor.
awesome teacher!  Would recommend class to anyone.  Guaranteed if you have a soul and pay attention

I took Professor Snodgrass' Atmos 120 course in Spring 2007. This was a very intriguing course and fairly easy if you kept on top of things. I highly recommend him as a professor. Just keep your cell phone off in his class though.
I love this man

Class is a breeze. You have to go to lectures because you get points for doing in class excercises (graded for completion only). Homework is a bit challenging but you get plenty of hints and help to do it. Exams aren't too bad either. Plenty of extra credit. Guaranteed A if you do the minimum.
Eric Snodrass is the best teacher ever!!!!!

Professor Snodgrass is BY FAR my favorite professor on this campus. He is extremely helpful and you can tell he really wants you to do well in his class. He is very passionate about his subject, and his enthusiasm definitely rubs off on his students. If you attend lectures and do the homework, you will be fine on exams. An excellent professor!

Professor Snograss is my favorite teacher on campus. He is very helpful and understanding. He is one of those teachers that will personally help you if you need help in the class. I would suggest taking this class, snodgrass makes it very exciting and fun.

Snodgrass is a really great teacher. I'm not interested in weather but he makes thunderstorm formation sound interesting. He's also very nice and helpful if you forget to submit an online homework and distributes grades so that tests aren't the main focus, but in order to get these points you have to go to class. Often shows videos in class.
Mmmm... :)
Really awesome professor.

This course wasn't as easy as I had anticipated. It requires a fair amount of reading as well as work. The material is pretty compact and the exams require a good amount of studying. However, Snodgrass is a very good instructor and tries to make his class exciting. His lectures can sometimes get a little boring; most of the time he makes class fun.

Prof. Snodgrass made ATMS 120 one of those classes you actually enjoy going to. He is very excited to teach, which is sometimes unusual to see out of professors. He had to rush through some material, but made things that were normally above my head understandable. Homework and quizzes were pretty easy as long as you do the reading Buy the book.
Snodgrass is the best Professor that I yet. He keep you interested in the material. He seemed to be very interested in the material. The test as long as you went to class the tests were pretty easy.

Great professor, but talks extremely quickly through material.  Very interested in material and wants students to do well.  Offers a lot of extra help.  Difficult exams, but will help you if you are struggling
The class is easy and interesting, especially with Snodgrass teaching it. He's super funny, smart, interesting, and cute. Too bad he's married haha. I'm going to miss him.
Snoddy is a very effective teacher as well as a very funny, likable guy.  He is very approachable and his notes are clear.  He's also a hottie.

Very fun and very interesting class.  Snodgrass is captivating and very enthusiastic about his subject.  You'll forget about the time.  Be sure to always go to lecture, because your attendance will add points to your grade, and you'll need his notes for the exams.
Excellent professor, very enthusiastic.  TAKE THIS CLASS!

About 45% of your grade is based on easy assignments.  Eric was super enthusiastic and tried to make lecture fun, even though I still managed to sleep through half of it.  Don't blow off exams, but overall it's an easy A if you pay attention and take notes w/ the powerpoints.  And I agree, he's definitely a cutie.

Professor Eric was a great teacher. He was so enthusiastic about this subject and as a result, I also really liked learning about this subject that I did not have much interest or knowledge in before.  He also really wants to have students do well.  He gives so many office hours and offered chances for students to raise their grades in a fair way.

Professor Snodgrass is a little cutie. He is seriously the nicest guy and best teacher. He explains everything very clearly and has a lot of enthusiasm teaching everything. All of his notes are online, but he gives you points for coming to class which are quite helpful because they do add up and help your grade in the end.

Really good professor! Class was not mandatory, but points were given for in class worksheets (easy though). He is very energetic and enjoys teaching, which makes the class even better. He is a really nice guy and very helpful.

Eric is soo funny, loves to show Youtube videos even if they are goofy weather videos.  Very sincere, very helpful in anyway he can be.  Grading is pretty nice, he gives some extra credit and makes life seem pretty relaxing!! I definitely recommend him! He's fun and I'm going to miss that class!!

He's hot, funny and very excited about weather. There is a bit of challenge problems, online quizzes and ALE's, but the discussion boards are a great help. Though he speeds through lecture slides, the class is very laid back. All in all Snodgrass doesn't care about how much he challenges you, he just wants you to be as excited about the subject as

Eric is a very enthusiastic teacher. He is also very helpful on the class discussion board, and he will curve the tests if there are not enough A's. You should be able to get an A in here if you are at class (lots of attendance points are available) and do a little studying. Not much reading is involved (10-20 pages per week).
He is very enthusiastic about what he is teaching and genuinely wants his students to be enthusiastic about it too. Very easy if you go to class, pay attention, and study for tests.
Great Great Great professor. Enthusiastic, and makes long lectures seem short. Really nice guy too.
He makes things so easy
Eric's a pretty cool teacher and he explains things well.  It's a good Gen Ed to take.
Great class, very easy and the information is fun.  Eric is able to present it in a very fun and interesting way and you can tell he loves teaching the class.  Easy A.
homework can be challanging so go to his office hours often. overall the class wasn't too hard if u showed up. just study the stuff and you'll get an A
